executive_brief: Momentum building in AI-native commerce tooling. Near-term wins in SEO and social proof; medium-term gains from refining onboarding and activating partner channels.

opportunities.title: Launch comparison pages for top alternatives
opportunities.why_now: Competitors rank on high-intent alt keywords; low content depth.

opportunities.title: Ship 1-click onboarding presets
opportunities.why_now: New users drop on step 2; presets remove friction.

opportunities.title: Founders' narrative Twitter thread series
opportunities.why_now: Earned media favors personal POV; leverage recent case studies.

opportunities.title: Partner co-marketing webinar
opportunities.why_now: Partner is shipping complementary feature; joint audience overlap.

opportunities.title: Docs quick-start refresh
opportunities.why_now: Top complaint: unclear getting started; reduce time-to-value.

opportunities.title: Referral program pilot
opportunities.why_now: Active user base ready; cheap new-user channel.

top_5_actions.name: Create 3 alt-keyword comparison pages
top_5_actions.why: Capture high-intent organic traffic and accelerate trust.

top_5_actions.name: Implement onboarding presets
top_5_actions.why: Cut activation friction and lift D1 completion rate.

top_5_actions.name: Schedule partner webinar
top_5_actions.why: Leverage partner audience and share credibility.
